summary: DT: CONTACT STATED WHEN  STEPPING ON THE BRAKES THE CAR JUMPED ALL OVER THE ROAD AND  IT WILL NOT STOP. IT BOUNCED AROUND UNCONTROLLABLY.  CONTACT NOTICED THIS PROBLEM WITH LESS THAN 3,000 MILES ON IT IN 1999.  THE DEALER TOLD CONTACT  THAT IT WAS THE BRAKES ON  AND HE HAD  BRAKES ON THE CHANGED.  BUT,  PROBLEM  RECURRED AS LONG AS  BRAKES WERE ON.  WHEN  CONTACT HAD THE ABS  BRAKES DISCONNECTED PROBLEM DISAPPEARED.  *AK
